Container.Name: explainshell
Container.Overview: Not everyone, especially people new to Linux and Unraid, know what a command that they type in having reqad it onlineonline command will actually do. Explainshell is here to help with that. Copy and paste a command into its searchbox then hit explain It will breakdown and display what each part of a Linux command means and does.
